docs.text: Health-BSA A small tool to compute the human body surface area from body weight (kg) and height (cm) Getting started The package can be found in the github. pip install health-bsa Feature BSA Usage >>> from health_bsa import compute bsa >>> bsa(weight=60,height=100) API >>> from health_bsa import compute bsa >>> bsa(weight=60,height=100) Contribution Any contributions are welcome Author Lam Nguyen
